content: True terror is to wake up one morning and discover that your high school class is running the country.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

content: An archaeologist is the best husband a woman can have. The older she gets the more interested he is in her.

content: Like everyone else who makes the mistake of getting older, I begin each day with coffee and obituaries.

content: Age appears to be best in four things old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.

content: Youth is when you're allowed to stay up late on New Year's Eve. Middle age is when you're forced to.

content: There is always some specific moment when we become aware that our youth is gone but, years after, we know it was much later.

content: One of the many things nobody ever tells you about middle age is that it's such a nice change from being young.

content: Inflation is when you pay fifteen dollars for the ten-dollar haircut you used to get for five dollars when you had hair.

content: To keep the heart unwrinkled, to be hopeful, kindly, cheerful, reverent that is to triumph over old age.

content: Old age is an excellent time for outrage. My goal is to say or do at least one outrageous thing every week.

content: While one finds company in himself and his pursuits, he cannot feel old, no matter what his years may be.

content: If you haven't turned rebel by twenty you've got no heart if you haven't turned establishment by thirty you've got no brains!

content: I don't want to fight aging I want to take good care of myself, but plastic surgery and all that? I'm not interested.

content: Middle age is the time when a man is always thinking that in a week or two he will feel as good as ever.

content: The denunciation of the young is a necessary part of the hygiene of older people, and greatly assists the circulation of the blood.

content: To keep the heart unwrinkled, to be hopeful, kindly, cheerful, reverent - that is to triumph over old age.

content: In old age we are like a batch of letters that someone has sent. We are no longer in the past, we have arrived.

content: When a noble life has prepared old age, it is not decline that it reveals, but the first days of immortality.

content: I've got volumes on how not to behave. I've got more information now than a guy should have at my age.

content: TV is sort of the only way to go for an actress my age to make a decent salary with independent films, you just can't.

content: The divine right of husbands, like the divine right of kings, may, it is hoped, in this enlightened age, be contested without danger.

content: In the digital age of 'overnight' success stories such as Facebook, the hard slog is easily overlooked.

content: My grandparents got married at a very young age, and a lot of what I think about marriage is based on their relationship.

content: We're taught at such a young age that you can always be better and that you're never perfect and that you're never good enough.

content: I hope to find the roles that are age appropriate but not yearning to be younger, or parenting ad nauseam.

content: Being successful at a very young age gave me the confidence and the capability to try out other things.

content: A woman my age is not supposed to be attractive or sexually appealing. I just get kinda tired of that.

content: People say women shouldn't have long hair over a certain age, but I've never done what everyone says.

content: Traveling to Russia and Germany and being able to see the world at a young age was really cool for me, and I really liked that.

content: I vividly remember being 14. That was the age when I started to get happy: I started being a writer and stopped being a loser.

content: It's often just enough to be with someone. I don't need to touch them. Not even talk. A feeling passes between you both. You're not alone.

content: Associate with men of good quality if you esteem your own reputation for it is better to be alone than in bad company.

content: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.

content: Always give a word or sign of salute when meeting or passing a friend, or even a stranger, if in a lonely place.

content: He that can live alone resembles the brute beast in nothing, the sage in much, and God in everything.
